metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000346 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Bouncy Castle JCE Provider version 1.55 and earlier the other partyDH public key is not fully validated. This can cause issues as invalid keyscan be used to reveal details about the other party's private key wherestatic Diffie-Hellman is in use. As of release 1.56 the key parameters arechecked on agreement calculation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1000346` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbcjmail-java - 1.60-1
libbcmail-java - 1.60-1
libbcpg-java - 1.60-1
libbcpkix-java - 1.60-1
libbcprov-java - 1.60-1
libbctls-java - 1.60-1
libbcutil-java - 1.60-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bouncycastle package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.60-1').
